title: Kanojo ga Kawaisugite Ubaenai
original_name: 彼女が可愛すぎて奪えない
sinopse:
A demon named Shion came to the human realm because of a trial that will decide who'll be the king of the underworld. However what he needs to do to prove himself worthy of such title may prove to be too difficult for Shion...?!

(Source: Chibi Manga)
